os.fullname: OS Portable (Source code to work with many OS platforms)
os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Portable (Source code to work with many OS platforms)

name: Print My Screen
short_description: Print My Screen allows you to take screenshots by the natural way of "Prt Sc" and "Alt + PtrSc". Then what it does new..? It allows you to specify a target folder or a word document to nicely compile your screenshots of say, test cases, in one common place. Can customize anything, from image size to naming the shots and documents.
summary: Java app to take Screenshots of your system.
